[**Cleaning Biodiversity Data in R**](https://cleaning-data-r.ala.org.au/) \
Data cleaning is hard, but it's a process that anyone who works with data must engage with if they want use their data to answer questions about the world. [*Cleaning Biodiversity Data in R*](https://cleaning-data-r.ala.org.au/) is a practical guide to cleaning geo-referenced biodiversity data using R. It is a targeted resource for anyone working with or interested in answering questions using data in ecology and evolution.
